#summary Use Cases for Distal
#labels Featured
Below are a number of use case examples to demonstrate how to use Distal:

=== Updating a section of your page with sports scores ===
<code language="xml">
<table id="scoreboard"> 
  <tr><th>Team</th><th>Team</th></tr> 
  <tr qrepeat="m scores"> 
    <td><span qtext="m.ateam.name"></span> - <span qtext="m.ateam.score"></span></td> 
    <td><span qtext="m.bteam.name"></span> - <span qtext="m.bteam.score"></span></td> 
  </tr> 
</table></code>
<code language="javascript">
distal(document.getElementById("scoreboard"), {scores: [
    {ateam: {name: "JFK", score: 4}, bteam: {name: "LAX", score: 2}},
    {ateam: {name: "LHR", score: 0}, bteam: {name: "SGN", score: 1}},
    {ateam: {name: "NRT", score: 1}, bteam: {name: "HKG", score: 2}},
    {ateam: {name: "BOM", score: 3}, bteam: {name: "IGU", score: 5}}
]}); </code>

===Updating toolbar button States===
<code language="xml"><div id="toolbar"> 
  <input type="button" value="Copy" qattr="disabled nocopy"> 
  <input type="button" value="Paste" qattr="disabled nopaste"> 
  <input type="button" value="Bold" qattr="class bold"> 
  <input type="button" value="Italic" qattr="class italic"> 
</div></code>
<code language="javascript">
distal(document.getElementById("toolbar"), {
    nocopy: true, nopaste: false, bold: "b", italic: "i"
}); </code>

===Flipping through content===
<code language="xml"><div qif="page1"> 
  Welcome! Click "Next" to start. 
</div> 
<div qif="page2"> 
  Your generated password is: <span qtext="page2.pwd"> </span> 
</div></code>
<code language="javascript">
distal(document.body, { 
    page1: null, 
    page2: { 
        pwd: "swordfish"
    }
}); </code>
